comment: The value of set exponentiation. ` ( A ^m B ) ` is the set of all functions that map from ` B ` to ` A ` . Definition 10.24 of [Kunen] p. 24. (Contributed by NM, 8-Dec-2003.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 8-Sep-2013.)
